sys_ui_script.name: x_1699952_attach_0.SP max_attachment_cou

sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_script_b00e28d383ee62108057f0b6feaad3e2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><ignore_in_now_experience>false</ignore_in_now_experience><name>x_1699952_attach_0.SP max_attachment_cou</name><script><![CDATA[var SPAttachmentVariableFix = (function() {

	function runFix() {
		var el = angular.element('[ng-controller="widget-sc-cat-item-v2"]');
		if (!el || el.length === 0) {
			return;
		}

		var scope = el.scope();
		if (!scope || !scope.c || !scope.c.data || !scope.c.data.variables) {
			return;
		}

		scope.c.data.variables.forEach(function(variable) {
			if (variable.type === 'attachment' && variable.attributes) {
				var attrs = variable.attributes.split(',');
				attrs.forEach(function(attr) {
					var parts = attr.split('=');
					var key = parts[0].trim();
					var value = parts[1] ? parts[1].trim() : '';

					if (key === 'max_attachment_count') {
						variable.max_attachment_count = parseInt(value, 10);
					}
				});
			}
		});

		scope.$apply();
	}

	try {
		var injector = angular.element(document).injector();
		if (injector) {
			var $rootScope = injector.get('$rootScope');
			$rootScope.$on('sp.widgets.rendered', function() {
				runFix();
			});
		}
	} catch (e) {
		// silently fail
	}

	return {
		init: runFix
	};

})();
]]></script><script_name>SP max_attachment_count Fix</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sigval.bergesen@gmail.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-07-10 09:08:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>b00e28d383ee62108057f0b6feaad3e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1699952_attach_0.SP max_attachment_cou</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Attachment Tags" source="x_1699952_attach_0">ed18d05b836e62108057f0b6feaad342</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Attachment Tags">ed18d05b836e62108057f0b6feaad342</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_b00e28d383ee62108057f0b6feaad3e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sigval.bergesen@gmail.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-07-10 09:25:21</sys_updated_on><ui_type>1</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
